about_the_game: Play the First Chapter of Liminalcore in the Demo and also see the teaser of the next chapters at the end of the Demo.
detailed_description: Play the First Chapter of Liminalcore in the Demo and also see the teaser of the next chapters at the end of the Demo.
name: Liminalcore Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 | AMD R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400 | Ryzen 7 3700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 | AMD Radeon RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Play the First Chapter of Liminalcore in the Demo and also see the teaser of the next chapters at the end of the Demo.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
